basics.name: Jason Novich
basics.label: Technical Writing | Freelance Technical Writer | Technical Communicator
basics.summary:
My name is Jason and I am a freelance Product Manager and Technical Communicator.

My passion is to help companies of any size create innovative products and solutions that have direct impact on the corporate strategy and bottom line. I have extensive experience in understanding market and customer requirements and mapping them to current and future software, hardware, and service roadmaps that match the corporate mission and vision. My expertise is bringing products from conception to inception and managing the product life cycle from end to end. 

I am looking for new freelance opportunities in content creation, technical writing, technical training, sales and marketing collateral and tools, outbound product management authoring of white papers, and performing competitive analysis.  Certified Agile Scrum Master and Certified Product Owner with extensive multi-disciplinary product management experience.

work.summary: My passion is to help companies craft and deliver technical documentation for innovative products and solutions that have direct impact on the user experience using the latest and most up to date delivery technologies and deployment platforms.

•	Creation & prioritization of product specifications / user stories based on customer requirements
•	Building and maintaining product line software and hardware product roadmaps 
•	Work closely with QA & engineering to deliver products that meet customer requirements
•	R&D project prioritization based on customer requirements vs. time to market
•	Managed in-house and outsourced technical writers 
•	Software R&D backlog grooming

•	Creation of product specs and user stories based on customer requirements
•	Feature definition and UI / UX wireframes for the Integrated Development Environment (IDE)
•	Strategize and evaluate emerging technologies
•	Building and maintaining product line software and hardware product roadmaps 
•	Software R&D backlog grooming
•	Management, maintenance and positioning of the Unitronics developers market
•	Competitive analysis and product positioning

publications.name: How Will Industry 4.0 Influence the Future of PLCs?
publications.summary: Jason Novich, Product Manager at Unitronics, provides insight into some of the latest industry trends and reveals how the company is getting ready for the fourth industrial revolution.

references.name: Michael Juwiler
references.reference: I had the chance to work with Jason on a product brochure and presentation. Jason is an outstandingly talented product manager, who can make any product look a million dollars. Jason’s knowledge extends far beyond product management, knows how the customer will react to different marketing messages. Jason’s technical knowledge goes beyond what anyone would expect, and he is able to generate marketing messages in any technology field. I was also highly impressed by Jason’s extremely rich English vocabulary, making the product brochure and presentation even more interesting to read. Jason is definitely a master in the field of product marketing.

references.name: Cara Bereck Levy
references.reference:
Jason Novich is, as a product manager, a rock star.
I do not say this lightly. We develop hardware and software in a field where Jason had no previous experience. In all of my years in this sector, I have never seen anyone learn so quickly--in short order, Jason was able to set direction for our development.
There is more--Jason is a really nice guy, and therefore is a pleasure to work with!

references.name: Benny Magrafta
references.reference: Jason Novich is  an energetic and highly motivated product manager.  He  is extremely passionate about new and cutting-edge technologies. Jason’s keen insight for analyzing competitors software offerings is superb, giving him the ability to see the big picture as well as the ability to drill down to details. Jason has exceptional abilities in both learning technologies and teaching others what he has learned, making him an asset to any organization. As head of Software Research and Development, Jason and I worked very closely together to help shape the direction of the integrated development environment as well as the software features for our hardware products.

references.name: David Fensterheim
references.reference:
Jason implemented organized product management processes in Elpas that did not exist prior to his employment.  Jason wrote comprehensive MRDs and PVRs and met weekly with R&D and Project Management to make sure that he was on top of the many development projects under way in the company.
Jason was often tasked with market research assignments that did not fall under his original job definition.
Jason was also supported MarCom in crafting copy for outbound collateral.

references.name: Barry Insell
references.reference: I have found Jason to be an excellent big-picture product manager who also excels in fine-tuning small details. Jason is highly skilled at leading the development and introduction of both new hardware and software products throughout the company. He is not afraid to speak his mind, knows how to apply lessons from the past to current situations, and clearly enjoys working hard to deliver quality work. I strongly recommend Jason for his talents, energy, enthusiasm, and ability to get things done.

references.name: Larry Leibson
references.reference: Jason is an energetic, out of the box thinker possessing a plethora of data and telecom knowledge.  He was a very dedicated and professional employee capable of conveying complex ideas and concepts in simple straight forward terms.

references.name: Alex Miller
references.reference: Jason's expertise and easy access made him a valuable back office IT support for our Agency.  He is also very affable and seems to have a working knowledge of everything technologically related.

references.name: Yuval Cohen
references.reference: Jason’s keen insight into technology combined with his skills in problem solving is a winning combination. Jason also has a sharp eye for analyzing customer needs and project management and his in-depth product knowledge and excellent people skills make him an asset to any team

Jason’s analytical and strategic thinking extend beyond the scope of his position creating an air of trust between him, his co-workers and customers alike. references.name: Richard Dinerman
references.reference: Jason is customer oriented, goal driven, dedicated, responsible, sharp, analytical, and FUN to work with - a valued member of our team and was instrumental in IBM Israel's winning the multi-year multi-million$ MoD tender (which at the time was one of the largest supply contracts in the country and anecdotally was honored with a system "named" after him). He understands the business issues as well as having a fantastic grasp of the technical aspects, sees the big picture, yet manages to keep his eyes on all the minute details - and combines this with excellent communications and presentation skills - in short, the consummate product marketing manager and an asset to any organization.
